name: Mitsubishi L200 Triton Sport
description: The new Mitsubishi L200 Triton Sport 2021 has reached the US Europe automotive market and is already a success wherever it goes. With a strong and robust look, this release promises to be among the sales leaders of the category.

name: Toyota Avanza
description: The Toyota Avanza is an MPV designed and produced by Daihatsu and marketed by Toyota. The Avanza was developed as an entry-level MPV mainly for the Indonesian market, and mainly produced in Indonesia by Astra Daihatsu Motor.

name: Hyundai Tucson 2022
description: Get ready for the all-new 2022 TUCSON. Your next adventure begins with more technology, more advanced safety, more power and more space. Not to mention a revolutionary redesign that is modern and captivating.
